intro.p: MonoRail uses a set of services to handle specific tasks. The framework is responsible for defining the default implementations, instantiate, start and configure them. The services are made available through a combination of lifecycle interfaces and an implementation of IServiceProvider

section.title: How to enable logging MR
section.p: The Apache HTTP Server Project is an effort to develop and maintain an open-source HTTP server for modern operating systems including UNIX and Windows NT. The goal of this project is to provide a secure, efficient and extensible server that provides HTTP services in sync with the current HTTP standards.
